Name: Echo
About the game: Prologue is Free to play! This is 'Echo' Free version. You may play the prologue (2+ hours of gameplay). If the game interests you, please consider purchasing the Complete Version DLC where you can transfer your cleared-game data and get a Prologue Clear Bonus! If you have enjoyed this title thus far, please support us by purchasing the Complete Version DLC. Everyone believes there is another world out there other than the one we live on. That such world is called 'Eveross,' but no one has ever foundt this separate world. Searching for this other world is one of the reasons that has been firing up adventurers. Experience the joy of exploring the unknown along with Lin, a young adventurer. Treck onward with your travel buddy. Can you keep pushing forward without forgetting the reason why you started even if you run in a thicket of thorns? This title has several difficulty levels. Story lovers can progress smoothly without being held back by difficult battles, but action lovers can still challenge themselves to tough fights by mastering their strategies. Protagonist growth occurs with each boss taken down, but it is up to you as to whether that growth is had specializing in attack, healing, or training. How you handle boss battles affects your growth. Tackle them using various skills and maneuvers, and you will see how all that greatly influences the progression path you take. Gather materials to make tools and strengthen your equipment. There are even puzzles and mini-games to challenge your mind aside from battles. Enjoy the rich side-stories and speedrun elements. Try to obtain all the trophies by tackling each thing one after another!
